post.text: With just days to go until the election, Republicans are pulling out all the stops to try to bring Hillary down. Share this to help set the record straight and get out the facts.

comment.author: William
comment.text: EXACTLY --- Does the Republican LIES and HATE -- NEVER -- STOP?

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: The only lies here is every time hillary opens her pie hole

replies.author: William
replies.text: Kyle -- That's not true and you know it. In fact, the FACTS show that Hillary has 27% lies while trDUMP's percentage is 71%. So, who exactly is the LIAR? donnie that's whjo.

replies.author: Nathan
replies.text: STOP. Just stop. Hillary & Huma know what's in the emails. Call a presser with Hillary &Huma & have Huma tell us everything. Full disclosure. That will clear it all up. We're waiting...

replies.author: Bryce
replies.text: But Hilary was the first person to mention Obama's Benghazi 9/11 video lie. And her previous campaign started the birther movement.
